comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: possibly the political scientist Hans Morgenthau

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: No, this is Henry Morgenthau, Senior (1856-1946), US Ambassador to the Ottoman Empire. His son was an adviser to US President Franklin D. Roosevelt. Here's his Wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Morgenthau,_Sr.
